Class WhileStatement

    • t7.statements.WhileStatement

    public class WhileStatement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statement

      • evaluateCondition

        public T7Boolean evaluateCondition(StatementHandler handler)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Evaluates the condition of this while loop and returns it as a boolean.
        Parameters:
        handler - the statement handler encapsulating the state of the program.
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the looping condition.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the while loop was given a range of an illegal type.
